sentences.en: Butyl cellosolve aka butyl glycol, ethylene glycol is poisonous when swallowed and a lung - tissue irritant.
sentences.cn: 丁赛路苏(碱性丁二醇、二醇单丁醚)吞食有毒,对肺组织有刺激作用.

sentences.en: Conclusion Physiologic irritant peptone mediated gastric adaptive cytoprotection.
sentences.cn: 结论生理性刺激物蛋白胨对胃粘膜具有适应性细胞保护作用.

sentences.en: Firefox , too , is more than a minor irritant.
sentences.cn: 同样,Firefox并不只是个小麻烦.

sentences.en: He said the issue was not a major irritant.
sentences.cn: 他说那个问题不是什么大问题。

sentences.en: Irritant dermatitis is a common condition, accounting for a significant proportion of occupational skin disease.
sentences.cn: 有刺激性的皮炎是一种普通条件, 解释头班的皮肤病的相当多的比例.

sentences.en: Irritant to nose and throat. Avoid breathing dust and fumes.
sentences.cn: 刺激鼻喉, 避免吸入尘雾体.

sentences.en: Irritant to skin. Harmful if swallowed.
sentences.cn: 刺激皮肤. 吞食有害.

sentences.en: It may be that the itching is caused by contact with irritant material.
sentences.cn: 瘙痒可能是由于接触了刺激性的物质而引起的。

sentences.en: Side effects included the brief occurrence of irritant contact dermatitis and folliculitis during therapy.
sentences.cn: 在治疗期间,会短暂发生的副作用包括皮炎和毛囊炎.

sentences.en: The cross - subsidy from paying patients is a major political irritant.
sentences.cn: 这种从付费病人给不能付费病人的跨越补助是今天的主要政治激点.

sentences.en: The key for corporate America is to embrace the irritant, while the challenge for innovators is to turn irritation into inspiration.
sentences.cn: 创新者的挑战在于把刺激物变成灵感，而那些非政府所有制的企业则需要接纳这种刺激物。

sentences.en: The noise of a constant irritant to city dwellers.
sentences.cn: 对敏感的皮肤有刺激性的物质.

sentences.en: The noise of traffic is a constant irritant to city dwellers.
sentences.cn: 车辆的噪音对城市居民是永无止境的骚扰.

sentences.en: The paper possesses nontoxic, non irritant and biodegradation advantages.
sentences.cn: 该纸张具有无毒 、 无刺激、可生物降解等优点.

sentences.en: The subarachnoid hemorrhage ruptured aneurysm is more of an irritant producing vasospasm than a mass lesion.
sentences.cn: 因动脉瘤破裂造成的蛛网膜下腔出血主要引发血管痉挛,其次才是团块损害.

sentences.en: Wear protective clothing to avoid skin contact with irritant chemical.
sentences.cn: 穿上护身衣物,以避免刺激性化学品触及皮肤.

words.tran_cn: 刺激的；气人的；使愤怒的
刺激的；刺激性的；使发怒的
激怒；使…无效；使…兴奋（irritate的过去分词）

trans.tran_en: a substance that can make a part of your body painful and sore
